# datePickerStyle

**Instance Property**

The current style of the date picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var datePickerStyle: UIDatePickerStyle { get }
```

## Discussion

This property always returns a concrete style, never [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDatePickerStyle/automatic].

## Configuring the date picker style

- **preferredDatePickerStyle**: The preferred style of the date picker.
- **UIDatePickerStyle**: Styles that determine the appearance of a date picker.
